channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 13:33 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Since further reports.
item.description: 🟢 13:33 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Since further reports.#Donetsk This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
